physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Shwedagon Pagoda in Rangoon
 Burma. The photograph shows the entrance to the Pagoda
 with steps leading up to the Stupa. There is a decorated archway at the top of the steps. At the bottom-left
 there is a horse-drawn carriage driven by a man. On the bottom-right
 there are several people sitting on the ground. There are also a few people on the steps to the Pagoda. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph. The top-right corner of the photograph is folded inwards.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Upper entrance of Shwedagon Pagoda, Rangoon
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Shwedagon Pagoda in Rangoon, Burma. The photograph shows the entrance to the Pagoda, with steps leading up to the Stupa. There is a decorated archway at the top of the steps. At the bottom-left, there is a horse-drawn carriage driven by a man. On the bottom-right, there are several people sitting on the ground. There are also a few people on the steps to the Pagoda. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph. The top-right corner of the photograph is folded inwards.
